title: Jrue Holiday isn’t surprised with Celtics overachieving this season

bullets: Boston Celtics "Knowing Jaylen [Brown], feel like he takes a lot of things personally.

title: How Drake Maye reportedly improvised play that sealed Patriots’ Super Bowl berth
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Maye won a footrace to the first down marker, reportedly calling his own number on an improvised bootleg Drake Maye Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff With the game on the line, Drake Maye won a footrace to the first down marker.
The Patriots were clinging to a three point lead and looking for a final first down that would allow them to run out the clock against Denver in the AFC title game last Sunday.
The plan, it appeared, was to hand the ball off to Rhamondre Stevenson.

title: 2 hospitalized after tent collapses under weight of snow at Medford nursing home
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News Two residents were sent to the hospital for serious but non-life-threatening injuries, the Medford Police Department said.
By Carson Lyle January 26, 2026 Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A pop-up tent collapsed on Sunday due to the weight of snow, sending two residents to the hospital, the Medford Police Department said.

title: Bills reportedly not looking to hire ‘radioactive’ Bill Belichick as head coach
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "He has only himself to blame, thanks to the bizarre distractions he created in North Carolina over the past year and his open hostility toward his long-time employer in New England.
